website_summaries.verdict: Durable, lightweight and affordable model from one of the top names in the industry.
pros: Compact and rugged, with a weather-tight shell, this monocular is capable of detecting heat signatures up to 1,200 yards away
Features a built-in five-hour rechargeable battery and up to 4x zoom with the top model
cons: No photo or video storage capability

customer_reviews.title: Poor or no definition of object
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item on June 1, 18.The ads say that this unit will identify animals up to 500 yards. At 100 yards it is possible to see a animal. There is no way to identify the animal. It may be a raccoon, rabbit or a hog. I have used the unit for about 36 hours in the field and am only able to identify an animal with supplemental light at 100 yards.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Easily spots hogs
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely worth the money. Easily spots hogs, deer, raccoons, people, anything 300 meters with no problem identifying what it is. It is so good you can even see your foot prints or an animals foot prints with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: DOUGLAS GRAY

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Words can not describe this camera! The detail the detail the detail!!! I would recommend this to anyone for any application! I've had it for a week now and bring it with me everywhere. I service car washes and it can see everything from water leaks to hot spots in motors and it's nice to have in the bad parts of the city... a lot of homeless people like to hang around car washes and it's nice to be able to see what's lurking in the dark. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: So after a ton of research I finally settled on this and I’m pretty darn happy with it. The color palettes are amazing, it’s not heavy, the battery life seems good thus far, etc. The ONLY limitation I can find thus far is the 240 does not have a zoom, but that wasn’t worth an extra $500 to me in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: nice tech but lack of zoom is a weak spot
customer_reviews.text: the thermal tech works well but the short range of the camera really limits the utility of this product.
customer_reviews.author: michaelr

customer_reviews.title: NO GOOD!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for coyote hunting at night, used it once and sent it back. I honestly don’t know what this would ever be good for in the hunting world. I used it along side a much better thermal monocular and difference was mind blowing. Be careful buying this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I expected more for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is so-so. For that price I paid, I would expect more. Also upset That it can’t take still pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Mojave Narrows

customer_reviews.title: Great if it was 1/4 the price
customer_reviews.text: This seems to work as advertised, tho its my first experience with thermal imaging. I have been able to detect signatures out to 300 yards in a cut bean field. Trees and underbrush seem to easily baffle the device, however. Cannot detect animals 2-3 yards into the weeds. Makes it a costly device for the capabilities
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: The reason I haven't done a review on this I wanted to wait to see how it works and I have to say I love this camera it works perfectly for me ,I wish there a way a recording on this camera, but that's okay.
customer_reviews.author: joe s.

customer_reviews.title: Lack of Product Detail
customer_reviews.text: I like the dexterity of use, optics are great and functionality is very understandable. One note of concern was the lack of pictures and details for this product. It DOES come with a MOLLE holster. I ended up purchasing a holster due to the lack of information and detail on the website for this product. Everything is included. Wish there was more detail and additional pictures prior to making the purchase. otherwise I would have rated a 5-star.
customer_reviews.author: Ninja Calling

customer_reviews.title: bought this for Hubby since we live in the woods ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this for Hubby since we live in the woods and he loves it cause now if we hear something in the woods he is able to see what it is.
customer_reviews.author: CDees

customer_reviews.title: But have played with it in back yard day and night i like the way it shows up heat both day and ...
customer_reviews.text: Have not got to try it to locate a down deer .But have played with it in back yard day and night i like the way it shows up heat both day and night. I believe its going to do what i like it to do.Help recover a down deer in thick cover
customer_reviews.author: harold sheets

customer_reviews.title: and my family has been having fun with it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, and my family has been having fun with it. It will definitely be going on our next camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H.

customer_reviews.title: Just not what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for what we wanted and had to send it back. We were wanting to see real imaging of animals and people at our boat house. I know our problem was we had looked thru a military scope that probably cost thousands of dollars and expected too much.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma J. in Tennessee, U.S.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. You can really detect heat from a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. You can really detect heat from a decent distance with this unit. Lightweight also.
customer_reviews.author: Jada Smallwood

product_meta.title: FLIR Systems, Inc. 431-0008-31-00 Scout III-240 Thermal Imager, Detector 240X180 30Hz, Black/Brown
product_meta.description: Scout II - 240 30HzThermal ImagerManufacture ID: 431-0008-31-00Scout III is the next generation of FLIR's field-proven line of compact thermal night vision monoculars. Offering enhanced performance with 30Hz or 60Hz imaging, and advanced image processing, the Scout III family is ready for your next adventure in the great outdoors. Scout III displays the heat emitted by animals, humans, and terrain?day or night?and has multiple applications for legal hunting, camping, land management, and outdoor recreation.Packages Include:- Handheld Thermal Camera- USB Power Adapter/Charger- Wrist strap- Custom Video out cable (320 and 640 version)- USB Cable- Quick Start Guide- Mole BagFeatures:Proven Performance:- Identify predators and track game better than ever- Detects heat signatures up to 1200 yards away, depending on model- High speed 60Hz or 30Hz frame rate displays lifelike thermal video- Crisp, clear 640 x 480 display screen Powerful; Yet Simple:- Starts up in seconds, no training required- Easy-to-use buttons: Power, color palettes, E-Zoom and screen brightness- Fast startup extends battery life by eliminating need for standbyCompact and Rugged:- Fits in any pocket, weather and impact-resistant- Single hand operation- Light weight, only 12 ounces- Weather-tight, ergonomic design- >5-hour Internal Li-Ion batterySpecifications:System:- Field of View: 24 18 NTSC- Start Up: < 1.50 Seconds- Waveband: 7.5 - 13.5 m- Thermal Sensitivity: 5 HoursEnvironmental:- Rating: IP-67, Submersible- Operating Temperature: -4F to 122F- Storage Temperature: -40F to 140F- Drop: 1mPhysical:- Dimensions: 6.70" L x 2.31" W x 2.44" H- Weight: 12 oz (Including Lens)Range Performance (No Extender):- Detect Man (1.8 m 0.5 m): 350m (382 Yards)- Detect Small Vessel (2.3 m 2.3 m): 945m (1033 Yards)
